name: api21
description: GoLang Fiber API with clean architecture

scripts.build:linux: GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -o bin/api21-linux cmd/server/main.go
scripts.build:windows: GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -o bin/api21-windows.exe cmd/server/main.go
scripts.build:mac: GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 go build -o bin/api21-mac cmd/server/main.go
scripts.test:coverage: go test -v -coverprofile=coverage.out ./... && go tool cover -html=coverage.out -o coverage.html
scripts.setup: go mod tidy && cp .env.example .env && go install github.com/cosmtrek/air@latest

author: Abhay2133

devDependencies.air: Hot reload tool for Go applications
